name: No More Nuggets
description:
Made in 72h for the #LDJAM

Trailer: https://youtu.be/ktdd-N2YrWo

The chickens are really furious and looking for some bloody revenge! They've geared up with the same meat shredders fast food companies use to end with their lives, and they want to shred everything that comes their way. Fight against your feathery sisters to see who is the farmyard queen in this 4-player competitive brawler. Or you can rebel on your own against opression while clucking "No More Nuggets"!

*Crazy non-stop feathery action
*Throw eggs and shred everything that you can find
*Up to 4 local players in vs and coop mode
*Funny pixelated violence
*Original soundtrack

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D / gamepad
right stick to aim
space /A (gamepad) / LT - jump
right mouse button / RT (gamepad) - shoot
left mouse button / X (gamepad) - pick things up and shred 'em

ALT+Enter = fullscreen

Follow us: @lubiterum
